title: Vactidy
description:
Explore the Vactidy App and Light Up Your Smart Life!
This amazing mobile application connects you with your smart devices, giving you effortless control over everything. Like magic, you can monitor and operate your devices in real time. No matter where you are, enjoy convenient control anytime, anywhere, and simplify interactions between smart devices.

Integrated Control for Greater Convenience!
We aim to provide you with a integrated and flexible lifestyle. With an intuitive and easy-to-use interface, you can effortlessly add appliances and enable seamless connections between smart devices, delivering unmatched convenience.

Share Joy with One Tap—Endless Fun!
Our goal is to bring more joy to your life. With a single tap, share devices with family and friends, manage them remotely, and fully embrace the fun of technology.

Connect to the Internet and Enjoy Unparalleled Convenience!
Once connected to smart devices, you can easily:
1. Start and pause your robot remotely.
2. View the cleaning map to see the robot's cleaning progress.
3. Set cleaning modes and track cleaning tasks.

Download now to experience the Vactidy cleaning "beast" and give your home a sparkling transformation!
descriptionHTML:
Explore the Vactidy App and Light Up Your Smart Life!
This amazing mobile application connects you with your smart devices, giving you effortless control over everything. Like magic, you can monitor and operate your devices in real time. No matter where you are, enjoy convenient control anytime, anywhere, and simplify interactions between smart devices.

Integrated Control for Greater Convenience!
We aim to provide you with a integrated and flexible lifestyle. With an intuitive and easy-to-use interface, you can effortlessly add appliances and enable seamless connections between smart devices, delivering unmatched convenience.

Share Joy with One Tap—Endless Fun!
Our goal is to bring more joy to your life. With a single tap, share devices with family and friends, manage them remotely, and fully embrace the fun of technology.

Connect to the Internet and Enjoy Unparalleled Convenience!
Once connected to smart devices, you can easily:
1. Start and pause your robot remotely.
2. View the cleaning map to see the robot's cleaning progress.
3. Set cleaning modes and track cleaning tasks.

Download now to experience the Vactidy cleaning "beast" and give your home a sparkling transformation!

Device & app history: read your Web bookmarks and history
Photos/Media/Files: modify or delete the contents of your USB storage
read the contents of your USB storage
Storage: modify or delete the contents of your USB storage
